summary: Website project for Kingston Customizations. User wants the 'Our Work' section updated: remove all existing photos and replace them with the newly uploaded/recorded photos the user has provided.
known_issues: Logo/image flashes a different image briefly before the correct one appears on load
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Outdoor kitchen construction framing with galvanized steel studs on a brick paver patio, workers visible in background (work-01.dim_1080x1350.jpg)
- Stone-clad outdoor entertainment wall with recessed TV niche and linear gas fireplace insert, viewed from side angle (work-02.dim_1280x960.jpg)
- Completed stainless steel built-in grill in a smooth stucco outdoor kitchen island with travertine countertop and tile flooring (work-03.dim_1080x1350.jpg)
- Modern outdoor kitchen island with travertine tile countertop and stacked stone veneer accent panel, under construction (work-04.dim_1080x1350.jpg)
- Aerial view of outdoor patio with stone veneer walls, wood ceiling fan, linear fireplace, and artificial turf (work-05.dim_1280x960.jpg)
- Outdoor kitchen frame wrapped in Wonderboard Lite cement board beside a backyard pool, pre-stucco stage (work-06.dim_1280x960.jpg)
- Outdoor kitchen frame wrapped in blue board insulation inside a garage, showing U-shaped layout (work-07.dim_1280x960.jpg)
- Covered outdoor living space with stacked stone fireplace wall, ceiling fan, Kamado grill, and teal patio furniture (work-08.dim_1280x960.jpg)
- Outdoor kitchen frame built with galvanized steel studs and Hardiebacker board in a desert backyard with gravel (work-09.dim_1280x960.jpg)
- Luxury backyard with rectangular stone fire pit, travertine tile deck, rectangular pool, spa, artificial turf, and pergola (work-10.dim_1080x1350.jpg)
- Outdoor kitchen island under construction with cement board cladding, worker measuring, travertine tile flooring (work-11.dim_1280x960.jpg)
- Close-up view of galvanized steel joist framing for an outdoor kitchen roof structure against a bright blue sky (work-12.dim_1280x960.jpg)
- Completed outdoor kitchen island with stacked stone veneer, stainless steel grill, three-drawer unit, and red Kamado grill at dusk (work-13.dim_1080x1350.jpg)
- Galvanized steel outdoor kitchen frame laid flat on a driveway showing grill cutout and access door openings (work-14.dim_1280x960.jpg)

existing_features.title: Fix the logo image flash in the Hero component so the correct logo appears instantly without briefly showing a placeholder, skeleton, or incorrect image first. The logo should only render once the correct image data is ready; until then, show nothing or a blank space rather than a transitional image that flashes.

Fix the logo image flash in the Header component so the correct logo appears instantly without briefly showing a placeholder, skeleton, or incorrect image first. Same behavior as REQ-1 — only render the logo once the correct image data is available.

Save the uploaded Kingston Customizations logo image (IMG_2219.jpeg — cream background with dark brown crown and script lettering) as a static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/logo.png and use it as the hero logo image in the Hero component. The image must be loaded directly from this static path (not fetched from the backend) so it appears instantly on page load with no flash, placeholder, or other image showing first. All other content and layout in the Hero component must remain unchanged.

Save all 14 newly uploaded project photos as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated/ using the following filenames: work-01.jpg (60417559408__EA07A836-4DBF-4202-B2B6-336CE9DC4F64.jpeg), work-02.jpg (IMG_2193.jpeg), work-03.jpg (IMG_7416.jpeg), work-04.jpg (IMG_7407.jpeg), work-05.jpg (IMG_3062.jpeg), work-06.jpg (60418777983__B4A1B7E7-D0BE-4D92-827F-4719EDF3DE81.jpeg), work-07.jpg (IMG_3573.jpeg), work-08.jpg (IMG_0619.jpeg), work-09.jpg (IMG_2833.jpeg), work-10.jpg (IMG_7766.jpeg), work-11.jpg (IMG_2569.jpeg), work-12.jpg (IMG_0039.jpeg), work-13.jpg (IMG_7794.jpeg), work-14.jpg (IMG_2641.jpeg).

Update the Gallery (Our Work) component to remove all previously used project photos and replace them exclusively with the 14 new static assets (work-01.jpg through work-14.jpg) loaded from /assets/generated/. The gallery layout, lightbox functionality, navigation, and all other UI elements must remain unchanged.

new_feature_requests.summary: Replace all existing photos in the 'Our Work' section with the newly uploaded/recorded photos the user has provided

projectName: Fix logo/image flash on load in Hero and Header components
